content.rendered:
Best credit card processing for contactless and NFC terminals in Los Angeles.

Upgrade to the convenient and secure way for customers to make payments, allowing for quick and hassle-free transactions using their mobile devices or contactless cards. 

Accept Payments Now

Customers can complete transactions by simply tapping their card or mobile device on the terminal, providing convenience and security.

  • Increased Security
  • Fast and Convenient
  • Reduced Fraud
Apply Today

Leading Los Angeles credit card vendor for contactless NFC terminals.

Apple Pay

Accept contactless payments from Apple Pay, Android Pay, and more. 

Security

All NFC payments are dynamically encrypted, for extra security. 

Speak to an Expert

How does NFC work?

NFC (Near Field Communication) payments work by allowing two compatible devices, like a smartphone or contactless card, to communicate when placed in close proximity, typically within a few centimeters. These devices exchange encrypted data, enabling secure and swift transactions. Users can pay for goods or services by tapping their NFC-enabled device at a compatible point-of-sale terminal, making payments quick, convenient, and secure.

Is NFC secure?

Yes, NFC technology is considered secure due to its encryption and short-range communication. To initiate a transaction, the devices must be very close, minimizing the risk of interception. Additionally, NFC transactions often require user authentication, such as a fingerprint or PIN, further enhancing security.
